review_data.title: Cannot recommend
review_data.content: The food is terrible and drinks are made without any passion. Beer would be the only thing to drink there, as it‘s from a closed bottle.

review_data.title: Great choice for anyone looking for a decent bar near Langstrasse / Europaallee

review_data.title: Good prices and vibe
review_data.content: Came for drinks and pizza. All served to our table at the bar which was ideal, especially as the bar gets full around 22hpp

review_data.title: delicious pizza slices with fancy toppings
review_data.content: We heard from friends about this restaurant & bar, so we went for drinks and pizza-slices and were not disappointed: they have some special toppings that you have to try, e.g. the one with wieners, french fries, ketchup and mayo. Sounds weird? It was delicious,...More

review_data.title: Nice bar with average service
review_data.content: Not a reason. to really complain bit the waiter was not really interested although we were pretty much alone and apart from the good decoration there were little additional pros. Okay but not more.

review_data.title: Solid pizza!
review_data.content: Have been here a few times and always enjoyed the staff, food and drinks. It’s a fun restaurant with an outside area around back. Highly recommend going!

review_data.title: Interesting slices
review_data.content: We stopped here late night after checking in to the 25hours hotel across the street. We ordered 2 interesting slices. One was a salad pizza and another had sausage with red sauce. Not cheap (~$8 a slice!) but really hit the spot and was enjoyable...More

review_data.title: Can‘t understand the hype

review_data.title: Cozy lounge and bar with take away pizza for lunch and dinner
